sentences.en: [ Woman On P . A . ] Attention, honoRguaRd detail, Report to staRboaRd hangaRbay.
sentences.cn: 注意, 请荣誉士兵向右舷机库港详细报告.

sentences.en: All boats should pass starboard side to RC boat.
sentences.cn: 船只需以右舷对竞委艇通过起航线.

sentences.en: And now the Vimy's starboard engine suddenly began to rattle like a machine gun.
sentences.cn: 就在这时候,“维米号 ’ 右舷发动机突然像机关枪似的嗒峪嗒地响—了起来.

sentences.en: He detected a ship moving down the starboard side of the submarine.
sentences.cn: 他发现有一艘船正在潜艇的右侧航行。

sentences.en: He ordered all the port cannon to be heaved to starboard to counteract the list.
sentences.cn: 他命令把左弦上所有的大炮移到右舷以抵消船的倾斜.

sentences.en: I could see the fishing boat to starboard.
sentences.cn: 我能看到右侧的那艘渔船。

sentences.en: Report to staRboaRd hangaRbay foRceRemonial bRiefiing and ReheaRsal.
sentences.cn: 右舷港口机库详细报告仪式简报和预演的情况.

sentences.en: Starboard point defense stations 1, 4, and 6 have been destroyed.
sentences.cn: 右舷抵御部分的1, 4, 和6也被损坏了.

sentences.en: The hull had suffered extensive damage to the starboard side.
The sand of the sea was driving that boat's head round to starboard.
sentences.cn: 海浪的推力把船头向右逼.

sentences.en: The ship gave a lurch to starboard.
We were sailing on starboard tack.
White icily - cold water foamed over the starboard side.
sentences.cn: 白色的冰冷的水在右舷一边泛着泡沫飞溅着.

sentences.en: Why don't you go starboard and see if you can unhook it?
sentences.cn: 那你去右舷看看你是否能把它解下来?

trans.tran_en: The starboard side of a ship or an aircraft is the right side when you are on it and facing toward the front
the side of a ship or aircraft that is on your right when you are facing forwards
